@js:s=[];t=[-1,1,.476,.298,.215,.165,.131];push=(t,u,x,y)=>s.push({title:t,url:u,style:{layout_flexBasisPercent:x,layout_flexGrow:1}});push("分类",null,t[1]);k=["全部分类","玄幻魔法","武侠修真","都市言情","历史军事","游戏竞技","科幻灵异","纯爱同人","女生言情","二次元","其他",""];k.map((s,i)=>push(s,`/cate/${i}-{{page}}.html`,t[4]));const a=[["总榜","allvisit"],["月榜","monthvisit"],["周榜","weekvisit"],["日榜","dayvisit"],["收藏","goodnum"]],
b={};a.forEach(([c,d])=>b[d]=c);push(`当前：${b[source.getVariable().trim()]||"未选择"}`,null,1);a.forEach(([c,d])=>push(c,`<js>source.setVariable('${d}');java.longToast('已选择 ${c}');</js>`,t[5]));push("分类-榜单",null,t[1]);k.map((s,i)=>push(s,`/rank-{{source.getVariable()}}-${i}.html`,t[4]));JSON.stringify(s);
